A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: You have LUKE SKYWALKER in a Star Wars movie and THIS is all you do with him? (!!!!) Have him wander around like an old man and not do anything at all? Are you serious? (!!!!) At least Han Solo got a lot of on-screen action before they killed him in The Force Awakens. Poor Luke is TOTALLY WASTED (!!!!) Everyone I know who is a TRUE Star Wars fan DESPISES this movie ... that goes out of its way to DISRESPECT the entire Star Wars Universe and its fans. Very sad!
